plugins.name: MathType
plugins.description: A mathematical and science formula editor with classical and handwriting input modes. Use it to create math equations or chemical formulas inside your content. MathType is a commercial solution delivered by our partner, Wiris.

htmlOutput._comment: For a complete list of available MathML element and attribute names, visit [MDN Web Docs for MathML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/MathML).
